In England, in the seven days to 05 December, there were 284,902 new confirmed cases (503.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 November, there were 250,775 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 14% (34,127 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 10 December is 9,092,016 (16,077.8 cases per 100,000 population).
